channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Did Inflation Kill the CAPM?
item.description: While the iummediate future may not be promising for the equity premium, it looks bright for factor premiums.

item.title: Stellantis threatens to kill production in the UK, saying the country has set sales targets for electric cars way too high
item.description: Managing director Maria Grazia Davino said Stellantis would be forced to make discounts to meet the targets.

item.title: Behavior of Crowds not Wisdom of Crowds
item.description: When behavioral crowds are roiling the markets, as they are now, best idea active equity has an excellent chance of outperforming.

item.title: Portfolio manager known for ‘The Big Short’ isn’t worried about Nvidia sell-off: ‘I don’t think it means anything’
item.description: Nvidia was still up 139% this year through Monday’s close.

item.title: Is the Outright Ban on a US Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) a Mistake?
item.description: Instead of outright banning a US CBDC, wouldn’t it be preferrable to establish clear and enforceable legislative guardrails?

item.title: Chili’s offers lifetime supply of free burgers
item.description: Among the runner-up prizes? A BurgerTime Arcade cabinet.

item.title: Concerned About Market Concentration and Lofty Valuations? Consider Small Caps
item.description: Investors are showing increased concern about large-cap stocks due to high market concentration and lofty stock valuations. Other factors combine to make a compelling case for small caps.

item.title: Prepping for the ‘unthinkable,’ Norway is stockpiling 30,000 tons of grain, citing the war in Ukraine, the pandemic, and climate change
item.description: The Scandinavian country stopped storing grain in 2003, but following Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine began reconsidering the program.

item.title: What Is Systems Thinking? A Primer with Applications for Sustainable Investing
item.description: Systems thinking is gaining in popularity in many fields including economics, finance, and investment management. Learn what it means and how it's being applied to sustainable investing.

item.title: Tesla issues its fourth Cybertruck recall in seven months because parts of the six-figure EV can come loose
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced Tuesday the recall may affect more than 11,000 trucks.
